trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cornwall

divs: Sighting DetailsIwent outside to have a smoke on m'y back porch, and as i was on the phone with m'y mother i seen what i thought was jus a bit Bright star as i was admiring it i noticed i was flying in the sky and beneath it a plane was flying it looked like a gas of Blue like a Bright star as it flew from the SE of Cornwall near the st Lawrence river to the Mort it was like domething shot out of it or sonething beamed down Fast but it kept going... 2 min aproximatly after they dissappearred two more black helicopters flew by... And then i freaked out went in aide to grab anotgwr smoke to calm down and when i went Back outside and i thought it was anotger plane but as it passed over There was a humming and it wasbt a plane none of the lights flashed or flickered it jus brightened they were a brownish Copper with a red light. As it passed all u h���re was like a swishing of the Wind and as it flee away it stayed Bright did not flicker .. But dissapearred and came back about four times then jus canished then annother Black helicopter went iin the same direction..
Summary: first one wa like a giant bright burning star.. second was like a diamond plane with lights that burned did not flash!
